review:
I was struggling with my fractured tooth for 3 months. 
Consulted Dr Sayona and in course of 15 days treatment which included extraction, porcelain fused with metal bridge preparation, scaling and a teeth guard I was relieved of all the pain. I had lost my appetite for food but regained it, thanks to the care and treatment of Dr Sayona.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I definitely recommend the dr and clinic and the team for implant treatment ,emerald dental is good to replace teeth

I have done my Root canal treatment from Dr sayona swati das ,I was scared before but she is so polite and good in her work ,I didn't feel any pain it was so smooth,I will definitely like to recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very polite.She listened to our problem very petiently and  advise us on a clear manner..

review: It was a good experience they explained everything well with pricing and all the habit related things which should be followed.

Everything was grt ,Dr.sanoya is grt,very professional.very fortunate to have found this caring dentist.come and check out this place .
completely satisfied
Thank u so much
Doctor was very polite and explained me everything on a very good way. I would surely recommend her for treatment.
